code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function ScanForm(_ref){let{onStartScan}=_ref;const[repoUrl,setRepoUrl]=useState("");const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!repoUrl.trim())return;onStartScan(repoUrl);setRepoUrl("");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"p-4 border rounded shadow",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-bold mb-2",children:"Start a Security Scan"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"url",placeholder:"Enter GitHub repo URL",value:repoUrl,onChange:e=>setRepoUrl(e.target.value),className:"border p-2 rounded w-full",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"mt-2 bg-blue-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded",children:"Start Scan"})]});}
